entry.title: 4 way to write a sentence
entry.content:
Grammar Review

Date: 20200130
Friday have a test.

4 type of sentence

simple sentence

1 s-v combinations

Prepositional phrases make sentence more detail. (can ignore, Grammar Use, 108)

Ex. I study every day.

complex sentence

2 s-v combinations
Rule:
a. ind dep
b. dep, ind

Ex. When I get home, I study.
When because if â€¦

relation:

1. Add related information
2. Show similarity
3. Show difference
4. Explain effect
5. Conclude

compound sentence

2 s-v combinations (today)
ind, CC(coordinating conjunction)FANBOYS+Ind

Compound Complex Sentence

4 way to make a compound sentence

coordinating conjunction

CC: FANBOYS (Bold is more common use)

For
And
Nor
But
Or
Yet (somethings very surprise)
So

Relation:

Visual Rules

  1. S, cc S. (only two sentence need common before the CC)

    Ex. I was tired; however, I played soccer.

  2. NS cc S.

  3. S cc NS.

  4. NS cc NS.

==Do not use CC in beginning of the sentence==

But however,

So Therefore,

And In addition,

Preposition(to, of, with, on) always have a object (noun) of I am studying

Class practice

Compound writing for 4 different types

  1. I must study. If not I will fail.

    1. I must study, or I will fail.
    2. I must study; otherwise, I will fail.
    3. If I donâ€™t study, I will fail.
    4. Without studying, I will fail.

  2. Iâ€™m staying home. The weather is bad.

    1. The weather is bad, so Iâ€™m staying home.
    2. The weather is bad; therefore, Iâ€™m staying home.
    3. Because the weather is bad, Iâ€™m staying home.
    4. Due to/Because of the bad weather, Iâ€™m staying home.

  3. I went to school. I didnâ€™t study.

    1. I went to school, but I didnâ€™t study.
    2. I went to school; however, I didnâ€™t study.
    3. Even though I went to school, I didnâ€™t study.
    4. Despite/In spite of going to school, I didnâ€™t study.

  • Lubricate joints
  • Regulate temperature
  • Nourish the brain and spinal cord

    Water in the organ

  • 3/4 water in brain&heart ~~ like a banana
  • 83% water in lungs ~~ like an apple
  • 31% water in dry human bones

    Water Loss

    Each day lose 2~3 L water

    How

  • Sweat
  • Urine
  • Bowel movement
  • Even breathing

    Low Water Level

    Happen

  • Release antidiuretic hormone
  • In the kidney, Blood will absorb and retain more water
  • Lead to dark urine, notable drops in energy, bad mood, skin moisture, blood pressure
  • Low water brain will work hard than normal >>> shrink

    Over-hydrated

    Victim

  • More >>> Athlete

    Happen

  • Slow and even stop release antidiuretic hormone
  • Sodium electrolytes will become diluted
  • Kidneys canâ€™t keep up with the resulting volumes of dilute urine
  • Water intoxication
  • Headache
  • Vomiting
  • In rare instances, seizures or death

    Suggestion

  • Drink eight glasses a day
  • 2.5-3.7 L for men
  • 2-2.7 L for women
  • Fruits and vegetable

entry.title: Sex Education: Should Be Deeper into People's Consciousness
entry.content:
This article went to recommended a TV Series called Sex Education. It released in 2019 on Netflix.

Attention: Spoiler Included

The first time, I saw the title of the TV series. And I guessed it might include lots of naked sense, but it was wrong. The director skillfully eliminated sexual images in audiencesâ€™ minds. It more prefers to education, not sex sense in the TV series. We can learn about characters grow up and how to solve the sexual problem when in puberty.

I hope that Otis and Ola can become a couple at the end. Ola is an outgoing and upright girl. She can understand what Otis needs. Otis was afraid of showing in public and fear of sexual. Ola can tolerate his mistakes and begin a new life in the Episode #1.8.

Eric, who is the coolest, bravest and kindest person in Otisâ€™s mind and his best friend dressed the drag queen makeup in the bus station. And the guys who were homophobes physically assault for Eric. Then Eric got hurt. But one day, he saw a guy, who dressed drag queenâ€™s clothes the same with him, asked Ericâ€™s road very confident, so he recovered his self-confident. In the dancing party night, episode #1.7, Eric, who dressed the drag queen makeup, talked to his father in front of the school gate. His dad was so worried about his makeup. Eric response, â€œFear cannot help me. It makes me weak.â€, his dadâ€œWhy do you have to be so much?â€, Eric said, â€œThis is me. I will be hurt either way. Isnâ€™t it better to be who I am?â€. The answer was so simple and clear. Just do ourselves. Like Eric, donâ€™t worry about what other people think.

Episode #1.5 was my favorite episode in Sex Education. Someone reveals Rubyâ€™s vagina in public. And the principal talked about this in the auditorium. And the bad guy shows her name to the public. And her friends went to defense her. And to said,â€it is my vagina!â€. Even the boy was coming to help Ruby. This scene was so powerful for me.

It does not show too much sex in the TV series, more education for us. But in some countriesâ€™ high school should more work hard on it. Do the best sex education for the teenager. The teenager will know what should they do, what should not do during puberty.
